Verses: 1 akkaalaththile Nee Solvadhu: Karththaave, Naan Ummaith Thudhippen; Neer Enmel Kobamaayirundheer; Aanaalum Ummudaiya Kobam Neengitru; Neer Ennaith Thetrugireer.
2 idho, Dhevane En Ratchippu; Naan Bayappadaamal Nambikkaiyaayiruppen; Karththaraagiya Yegovaa En Belanum, En Geedhamumaanavar; Avare Enakku Ratchippumaanavar.
3 neengal Ratchippin Ootrugalilirundhu Magizhchchiyode Thanneer Mondukolveergal.

4 akkaalaththile Neengal Solvadhu: Karththaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Naamaththaith Thozhudhukollungal; Avarudaiya Seygaigalai Janangalukkulle Ariviyungal; Avarudaiya Naamam Uyarndhadhendru Prasthaabampannungal.
5 karththaraik Keerththanampannungal, Avar Magaththuvamaana Kiriyaigalai Seydhaar; Idhu Boomiyengum Ariyappadakkadavadhu Enbeergal.
6 seeyonil Vaasamaayirukkiravale, Nee Saththamittuk Gembeeri; Isravelin Parisuththar Un Naduvil Periyavaraayirukkiraar.
